entry.title: Mustachedom/md-drugs
entry.summary:
An in depth free drug script for QBCore

Support

if you have any issues, you can come to my discord and throw a ticket in. I hope i can get it fixed ASAP Rocky

My Community Discord Invite Link

Credits

This was all possible because of creators and devs in Project Sloth, JixelTay, and Samuel's development. I used the globalstates and spawning of props from Samuel's christmas script (I asked permission before release)

Samuel's Tebex.

Project Sloth has been a pioneer of how the fivem community should be. Helping the community by creating free, easy to install, and fun scripts. Along with allowing the community to publish free scripts. and Jimathy and Tay are the sole reason I learned(ish) how to code. When I started back last year, I had no idea what I was doing and their scripts are easy to read, edit, and see how things actually function. without those scripts I would forget 1000x more commas and not understand how code communicates. If you don't have any of their scripts. you are missing out.

Jim's Tebex

I am not affiliated with any of these creators above but I have to give a shout out to the community when I can.

  • Big Credit to Samuel's Development for the way they did globalstates. That was the main inspiration to the beginning of this script.
  • Big Credit to Project Sloth as a team and also the Project Sloth Community. This was only made because of the big library of Free scripts published by them and their community. Buy Them coffee or something.
  • Big Credit to Bostra. if you have been around you may have seen him post some free scripts and help people. There was definetly times I dm'd him saying what the fuck am I doing and he helped keep me sane.
  • Big Credit to Feisty. She made all the images that look good. Seriously you can tell which ones I forgot to ask her for.

Dependencies

  • qb-core

  • LJ/PS or qb inventory

  • ps-buffs

  • ps-ui

  • qb-target

  • polyzone

  • RPEmotes

How to install like a fuckin bosssssss

  • STEP 1 Add items To qb-core - > shared -> items.lua

  • STEP 2 Add Images from HTML folder to your inventory script images location
  • STEP 3 delete qb-drugs
  • STEP 4 INSIDE OF THE CONFIG change all the locations for everything. All locations have been changed to make a preview video easier and with how big of a script this is, Im not going to config it for every city. Its simple vec3 and vec4s. Make your city unique so its not in the same location as every other city.
  • STEP 5 in qb-radial menu search for
event = 'qb-drugs:client:cornerselling',

and switch it to this

event = 'md-drugs:client:cornerselling',
  • STEP 6 in qb-adminmenu look for
QBCore.Functions.CreateCallback('test:getdealers', function(_, cb)
    cb(exports['qb-drugs']:GetDealers())
end)

in the server.lua and change it to

QBCore.Functions.CreateCallback('test:getdealers', function(_, cb)
    cb(exports['md-drugs']:GetDealers())
end)
  • STEP 7 in Cornerselling.lua line 30 and line 148 of deliveries.lua on the client side for both place your Police Alert inside that function. for example something like ps-dispatch will look like this
local function PoliceCall()
   local currentPos = GetEntityCoords(PlayerPedId())
                TriggerServerEvent("dispatch:server:notify", {
                dispatchcodename = "susactivity", -- has to match the codes in sv_dispatchcodes.lua so that it generates the right blip
                dispatchCode = "10-66",
                origin = {
                    x = currentPos.x,
                    y = currentPos.y,
                    z = currentPos.z
                },
                dispatchMessage = "Oxy Runs",
                job = {"LEO", "police"} -- has to match the recipientList in sv_dispatchcodes.lua
            })
end
